about_the_game:
THE DEVELOPERS

This game is funded, developed and published entirely by danish indie game developer Mark Kragerup and swiss indie game developer Jonas Oppliger. If you want to stay updated or have a chat about the game, we would love for you to join us at our discord server.

THE GAME

We could go on and on about how this game combines all our favorite elements from tower defense and roguelite games. In short, the core essence of the game is a deep tactical tower defense experience, with tons of new elements. It has a great focus on looting, crafting and upgrading fighters. It offers endless playability, with infinitely scaling difficulty levels, endless progression systems and online co-op content. If you are the type of person who would find joy in assembling and gearing up armies, slaying hordes of enemies and doing quite a bit of time traveling, this game might be for you!

Want to know exactly what we are working on putting into this game? Have a glance of our continously updated roadmap below!

GAME ROADMAP

TIMEAGES
  • Prehistoric ✓
  • Ancient Empries
  • Viking ✓
  • Medieval
  • New World Exploration
  • World at War (I & II)
  • Modern Warfare
  • Post apocolyptic
  • Cyberpunk
  • Year 4001

UNITS & CONSTRUCTIONS
  • Fighters (9/35)
  • Ranged (8/40)
  • Constructions (2/12)
  • Traps (1/6)

ENEMIES & BOSSES
  • Minions (9/50)
  • Elites (2/16)
  • Bosses (2/20)

TIMEKEEPERS & PLAYER SPELLS
All Timekeepers have unique traits. Player spells can be combined into hundreds of build combinations.
  • Timekeepers (1/6)
  • Player spells (6/35)

MAPS
Bigger maps have more pathways to defend, and generally take longer to play through.
  • Small size (1/4)
  • Medium size (0/5)
  • Large size (0/3)

ITEMS
Items are looted, crafted and combined to empower your fighters and constructions, turning them extremely powerful for various playstyles.
  • Carry items (0/14)
  • Tank items (0/8)
  • Bruiser items (0/9)
  • Support items (0/6)
  • Assassin items (0/5)

META PROGRESSION
  • Player talent tree
  • Timekeeper ability builds
  • Paragon progress

GAME MODES
  • Intro mode ✓
  • Campaign mode
  • Quick matches
  • Endless mode
  • Challenge difficulties

ONLINE CO-OP
  • 2-player quick match
  • 2-player endless mode
  • 2-player challenge difficulties

Thank you for reading this far! You are a treasure, and it warms our little indie developers heart. We will see you on the battlefields!

legal_notice: Copyright © 2023 Maincode. Developed by Mark Kragerup & Jonas Oppliger. All rights reserved.
name: Timekeepers Defense

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows® 7 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-4160 or AMD® FX-4350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ GTX 650 or AMD® Radeon™ HD 7750
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-3570K or AMD® FX-9590
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ GTX 970 or AMD® Radeon™ R9 390X
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Defend your time machine in this unique take on roguelite tower defense gameplay. Travel through the ages to recruit fighters and mount advanced defenses, in a handful of challenging gamemodes. Unlock new Timekeepers, and push your builds to the limit in the face of endless onslaughts.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Danish, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
